AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: livestock
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents intended to eat [PAWN_possessive] after [PAWN_possessive] birth. Somehow [PAWN_pronoun] was able to slither away before being eaten and grew up alone in the wilds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: royal bastard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]was one of the many jeub bastards in the Royal Court of Jeubscalon. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to survive there, using [Pawn_possessive] wits to survive.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of Jeubscalon's crack Child Soldier Division. [PAWN_pronoun] fought in many battles, starting from the age of only 2 years.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: raised by humans
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found abandoned on the border of Jeubscalon by a family of human farmers. For some reason, they took [PAWN_possessive] in and raised [Pawn_possessive] as one of their own.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Rata Jeub orphan
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in the slums of Rata Jeub. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn many skills to survive in such a competetive environment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child gang leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always smarter than [PAWN_possessive] peers. [PAWN_pronoun]organized the local urchins into a gang under [PAWN_pronoun] leadership.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cannon fodder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the army of Jeubscalon. Somehow, [PAWN_pronoun] survived when the rest of [PAWN_possessive] unit was slaughtered.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: jeub noble
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the lucky few Jeubs to be member of a noble family. Unlike most [PAWN_pronoun] was able to fulfill [PAWN_possessive] basic needs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: servant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the household of a jeub nobleman for many years, doing whatever tasks he required.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: botox miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] laboured long years in the botox mines of the Jeub Isles before escaping.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Boiling Rock inmate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was arrested and sent to the boiling rock. There [PAWN_pronoun] joined one of the many gangs and fought for survival.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: jeub pacifist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] saw the horror and violence of the jeubish lifestyle and desired to change it. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] quickly realized that jeubs were inherently violent and [PAWN_possessive] was pointless.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: jeub farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a farmer, growing botox and processing it into drugs and consuming a great deal of [PAWN_possessive] own supply.
